verses.roman:
tabe prabhu śrīvāsera gṛhe nirantara
rātre saṅkīrtana kaila eka saṁvatsara

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; prabhu—the Lord, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrīvāsera—of Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; gṛhe—in the home; nirantara—always; rātre—at night; saṅkīrtana—congregational chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; kaila—performed; eka saṁvatsara—one full year.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu regularly led congregational chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra in the house of Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura every night for one full year.
